name: i3-docs
description: Awesome doc generation for LabVIEW projects

scripts.hash-win64-make: bin\hashdeep64.exe -b lv\i3-docs.lvproj lv\i3-docs.lvlib lv\Controls\* lv\Main\* lv\SubVI\* > hashdeep.txt
scripts.hash-win64-check: bin\hashdeep64.exe -v -v -v -b -a -k hashdeep.txt lv\i3-docs.lvproj lv\i3-docs.lvlib lv\Controls\* lv\Main\* lv\SubVI\*
scripts.hash-linux-check: hashdeep -v -v -v -b -a -k hashdeep.txt lv/i3-docs.lvproj lv/i3-docs.lvlib lv/Controls/* lv/Main/* lv/SubVI/*

author: Milan Raj (@rajsite)
